data.lyric:
[ti:Night Shift]
[ar:Jon Pardi]
[al:California Sunrise]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Night Shift - Jon Pardi
[00:02.65]Lyrics by：Tofer Brown/Phillip LaRue/Billy Montana
[00:05.30]Composed by：Tofer Brown/Phillip LaRue/Billy Montana
[00:07.95]Produced by：Bart Butler/Jon Pardi
[00:10.61]It's been a wreck me week
[00:12.69]
[00:13.41]Sixty plus from dawn to dusk
[00:15.51]In the red dirt heat
[00:17.63]
[00:18.52]Busting it up for a couple of bucks
[00:20.47]But it ain't no thing
[00:23.20]Just another day till I'm on my way
[00:25.64]To them cool cool sheets and you and me
[00:29.78]Working on the night shift baby
[00:33.82]
[00:34.55]Dying for your touch like crazy
[00:39.05]
[00:39.57]Racking up the overtime hours
[00:43.30]Loving how we're working on the night shift baby
[00:48.81]
[00:50.66]Gonna rock it right
[00:53.16]No need to talk I know what you want
[00:55.44]And what you like
[00:58.10]Cause I do too yeah
[00:59.45]I love how you leave on the lights
[01:02.89]Not a thing between you and me
[01:05.43]And it feels so nice when you and I are
[01:09.57]Working on the night shift baby
[01:14.01]
[01:14.66]Dying for your touch like crazy
[01:19.62]Racking up the overtime hours
[01:23.25]Loving how we're working on the night shift baby
[01:29.03]
[01:31.68]Yeah yeah
[01:39.56]
[01:40.57]It's been a wreck me week
[01:42.71]
[01:45.06]Oh but who needs sleep
[01:47.90]
[01:49.24]When you working on the night shift baby
[01:54.06]
[01:54.58]Dying for your touch like crazy
[01:59.03]
[01:59.58]Racking up the overtime hours
[02:03.18]Loving how we're working on the night shift baby
[02:09.04]
[02:10.79]Loving how we're working on the night shift
[02:14.48]
[02:15.78]Loving how we're working on the night shift
[02:19.49]Working on the night shift baby
